tool.name: Get.rabund
tool.description: Get rabund from a otu list or sabund
tool.command:
echo 'get.rabund( #if $label: label=${ str($label).replace(",","-") }, #end if #if $count: count=$count, #end if #if $otu.is_of_type("mothur.list"): list=$otu, #elif $otu.is_of_type("mothur.sabund"): sabund=$otu, #end if sorted=$sorted )' | sed 's/ //g' ## mothur trips over whitespace | mothur &&
## move output files to correct destination prefix="$otu" && mv mothur.*.logfile "$logfile" && mv \${prefix%.dat}*.rabund "$rabund"

param.name: sorted
param.label: sorted - sort by abundance
param.help: By default the data in the rabund file the same order as the OTUs in input, select to sort by abundance.

tool.help:
@MOTHUR_OVERVIEW@
**Command Documenation**
The get.rabund_ command generates an rabund_ file from a list_ or sabund_ file.
.. _rabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Rabund_file .. _list: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/List_file .. _sabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Sabund_file .. _get.rabund: http://www.mothur.org/wiki/Get.rabund
